A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I loved every Star Wars film until now.
Humor made light of the villains and they were no longer threatening.
No characters were explored from their introduction in the previous film.
I was hoping to see Rey get trained\, but she wasn't and even beat down Luke which made no since.
Flying Leia.
Phasma had 5 minutes or less then dies.
Luke is a hermit bafoon.
Holdo was elegant and smart\, then she dies.
Huge plot issues. Waisted time in a casino while their ship is being chased and they decide to free animals into the woods when they'll obviously get recaptured. After the cliff hanger in the last move while Rey hands Luke his old saber\, then in this film he chucks it over his shoulder for humor. It's like Rian Johnson (the director) wanted to crap on all serious moments and turn it into Space Balls 2.
Luke Dies in a very pathetic way. Waste of time and money.
